app.name: Dump Mii NAND
app.long_description:
This will create a nand.bin file in the same folder on SD as the boot.dol file. If not run from SD, it will create it in SD:/nand.bin. (If on SD, no folder name in the path can have more than 8 characters)
Arguments: debug= show debug output (defaut's to 0) path= for a custom path to the nand.bin file on SD. E.G. path=/apps/nanddump/nand.bin
